reviewText: The quality of the content, as expected, television quality from 90 century original broadcast. I consider Silk Stalkings a good buy. The packaging was good, thanks.
excellent series - sorry it did not last longer

I started watching Silk Stalkings when it began & it was my favorite show then & now! I have often wondered WHY all the other shows have been released on DVD and/or played on re-runs & this show has not ~ Big mistake! I have looked for the DVD's for so long & finally found them on here & was sooooooo very happy & very pleased when they finally got here. My husband stated he should have video taped me getting it in the mail because we could have possibly won $10K on AFV. LOL Anyway, I watch them every night and any chance I get when I need to unwind & reminisce back to the BEST era ever!
Great shape but season 2 episode missing a scene but this is Anchor Bay problem
I liked this show very much when it was on in first run,the first 5 seasons were the best.  The quality of the DVD's I received was very satisfactory, and I'm happy with my purchase.

I have been thinking of this series the past few months and finally got to your website and ordered it.  I love old tv shows.  A co worker told me about this show when it was on the USA network.  I got hooked.  Rob Estes is hot. and Rita lee Lance and Chris Lorenzo are hot.  I love that they called each other Sam! it personalized the show and it showed what great comeraderie they had.  When I watched the first episode it just took me back.  Thanks for the memories.  It is a show I would recommend.

One Of The Best Top 5 Cop Shows, Too Bad Its Not On The Air Anymore. It Ranks Up With Night Heat Not Yet On Dvd But Someday Soon I Hope. If You Never Seen Silk Stalkings Rent It On Nextflix, Or By It. You Will Enjoy It. I Have All 5 Seasons On Dvd Im Glad They Released It.
